nodes.text: Gesaral Beta was a planet within the Galactic Empire. According to Leo Leonis, it had rain that was so dangerous that it could actually kill a human.

Servants of the Empire: The Secret Academy author Jason Fry has stated that he intended for this to be the planet where it rains razors of glass on Ania Solo in Dark Horse Comics' Star Wars: Legacy Volume 2 series, however, he never explicitly said so within The Secret Academy. He further states that he would "leave it to Wookieepedia to work out the canonicity." As the information does not appear within the novel itself and is not approved by the Lucasfilm Story Group, it cannot be considered canon.
